mapper.select: SELECT d.database_name FROM db_info d INNER JOIN database_group_relation dgr ON d.database_guid = dgr.database_guid INNER JOIN user_group_relation ugr ON dgr.group_id = ugr.group_id INNER JOIN user_group ug ON ugr.group_id = ug.id WHERE ugr.user_id = #{userId} AND ug.valid = TRUE AND ug.tenant = #{tenantId} AND dgr.source_id = 'hive'

SELECT si.data_source_id, si.business_leader, users.username as userName, users.account, si.tenant_id FROM source_info AS si INNER JOIN tableinfo AS tb ON si.database_id = tb.databaseguid INNER JOIN users on si.business_leader = users.userid WHERE si.VERSION = 0 AND si.category_id IS NOT NULL AND si.category_id != '' AND tb.status = 'ACTIVE' AND tb.databasestatus = 'ACTIVE' AND TB.tableguid = #{tableGuid}
